description:
This application is to provide the user with easy access to the posts on GoNintendo along with allowing them to listen to the podcast. We also have search and tips features. For suggestions on the Application please email comments to Boyrobber2@gmail.com Updates coming as often as possible. Thanks!

UPDATE: 1.1.0 includes the following updates: 1. automatically puts the tips email in there.
2. corrects errors with the icon.

UPDATE: 2.0.0
1. Adds drop-down list of News Feeds
2. Allows users to listen to Gonintendo Podcasts

More updates coming soon.
